title: All the ways that Georgia is ground zero for the next two election cycles
description: With upcoming primaries, elections and runoffs for both the Governor's mansion and the U.S. Senate, , Georgia is about to be the most important state in the 2022 midterms. Republican strategist Brendan Buck and WXIA anchor Jeff Hullinger join Chuck to talk about the many races for voters in the Peach State
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
